name: H. Fox
text: Absolutely love visiting Mellow Mushroom no matter where. Love the atmosphere, the employees are friendly the food is amazing and never fails to please your appetite. Great  selection of drinks be it fountain drinks ypur favorite beer or ‚Ä¶More

name: Jason York
text: Very good, fresh food. The tea was excellent as well. Our server, Sharitta was very friendly and did a fantastic job! It's pricey, but very good.

name: Dee Dial
text: The pizza crust tasted unique and very fresh. We ordered a medium size pizza and it was still too much. Well worth its price. ‚Ä¶More

name: Janea Fleming
text: It's by far one of the best chain restaurants I have tried here in Montgomery. The pizza was good and üî•. But its not the best mellow mushroom pizza I had before. The service was extremely slow considering the was less than 5 people in the place and they had no CO2 for the soda. So drink options were limited.

name: Anitra Thomas
text: I had the pleasure of having lunch at The Mellow Mushroom off Taylor today and it was fantastic! The food hot & fresh and the service was spot on! Great job guys I will definitely be back!

name: B J
text: Sodas were flat.  Hate the new paper straws.  No parmesan cheese on the tables.  Pizzas took forever and came out wrong.  Crust was horrible...way too thick and the toppings were not pulled out properly to the edges.  Charged $4 for chicken ‚Ä¶More

name: Frederick Drake
text: High price considering but good pizza and atmosphere...

name: Jordan Autrey
text: The manager Brittany was our server and she was excellent! We can tell the quality of service and food has increased since her promotion to manager! We come once a week and will be letting everyone know that mellow vaughn road is the place to be!!!!!!!

name: Stephanie McCormick
text: Great family dining!! Amazing food (gourmet white is TDFüôÑ) Super cool attractions too! We always hunt for the Mellow when on the road too... üòòüòâ

name: Jeremy Warnken
text: We came in and they only had 5 tables of customs and it took over an hour to get our food. No ice for the drinks when I asked for the dill it took another 20 minutes to get it.

name: Francesca Cooley

text: Food was fine. The service was not great though. I was there for 30 mins just for a soup.

text:
horrible experience. who knew that a PIZZA place could screw up pizzas??

service was poor and pizza was worse. our table ordered 5 pizzas.. one pepperoni ‚Ä¶More

We will be driving out to the Prattville location from now on.

name: Sandy
text: Service was good. The food was not. The pizza was burnt! I ordered a brownie and it had a burnt taste as well. They were also out of straws.

text:
One roach is too many...

text: Best pizza I ever had! The manager Brittany was so pleasant to us even though we came in right before closing! I will most definitely be back!!!!!!!

name: Tanya Brumett
text: We stopped in to kill time before a movie. The food and service was mediocre.

name: Amanda Phillips

text: Server was very good and attentive. Lunch combo of a slice and salad is a quick meal with huge portions-you could almost split it between 2 people!

text: The food was great. The waitress was great. And, was patient because my daughter couldn't figure out what she wanted to eat.

name: Carla Padavan
text:
The staff were rude and defensive and the portions they serve are inconsistent and overpriced.   Their customer service makes the place suck.
It's a shame because the food is all right.@ the Vaughn Rd. location in Montgomery.

name: Carrie Stark
text: Good gluten free pizza. Good dairy free options also. Nice waitstaff.

name: Lynn Whittington
text: Ordered online. Pizza was not ready when promised because they said they ‚Äúran out of cheese‚Äù. Ran. Out. Of. Cheese. The wings we ordered were also unavailable. The Thai pizza we finally got was smothered with red pepper flakes and inedible. Horrible staff, horrible food and horrible customer service. Probably will never go back.

name: Leigh Sansone
text: Pretty good pizza, they do have options for vegan and gluten free eaters. Each resto‚Äôs atmosphere is different and that makes this chain seem unique.

name: M Remi
text: Really like Mellow Mushroom. Food is always delicious. Great staff. I am so glad that they stop charging for extra to go parmesan. üëç. I have never had a complaint about their product. I do wish they had a better (more coupons) reward system.

name: Carol Roberts
text: We have gone here after movies several times. The service has always been very good and friendly. The pizza was good but just standard pizza, nothing particularly new or exciting. The meal was very good and reasonably priced, and it's a nice spot to dine once the movie ends.

name: Cecil Stephenson
text: The service is subpar. With 4 tables full and the rest open, one would expect for a speedy service. A couple and their child were seated before we arrived and 45 minutes after we order our food, their food finally comes. We are still ‚Ä¶More

name: Susanna Bader
text: There was black stuff in the ice, both stalls in the women's bathroom were out of order. The bathroom was completely disgustingly dirty. Food was good & our waiter was excellent.

name: Sugar Face Doll
text: The whole place was empty. No one greeted us for 20 minutes. When the bartender finally came, she seemed really bothered by the fact that we wanted to order food. She had little knowledge of the menu and how food was prepped. And took a further 15 minutes to pour a pitcher of beer.

name: Kayla Hines
text: This place is fantastic. The wait staff is amazing. Even under unexpected pressure they manage to shine!. Keep it up. My pizza and pretzels we're amazing üòéüòç

name: Nathan Raycroft
text: Thank you for lunch (salad and pizza).

name: Susan Turner
text: Hot and muggy inside the building. We had to eat while sweating! Had to ask for refills, ticket, boxes, and silverware (still only got one set for a party of 9). Pizza was less than impressive. Won‚Äôt be back!

name: M Girkinger
text: Terrible service, pizza served cold, items forgotten, had to request for silverware and drinks several times. At one point out server say down in a booth with another server and a third had to come over to help is instead. Do not recommend this location at all.

name: Terrence Rodden

name: Trey Hawkins
text: Sausagefest Calzone was under cooked but my server I had was the best I ever had and will ever have so I‚Äôm completely fine with it and put it in the oven when I got home and was sad I couldn‚Äôt eat it with his presence :the servers name was drew

text: Great food, fast service, the employees there are very kind and polite. It's reasonably priced. The building and eating area is very clean. I would recommend that you go and try it.

name: Tracy A
text: Pizza was really good.  Staff very friendly.  No "Chuck E Cheese" atmosphere.  Only reason for 4 instead of 5 was $$. I suppose I should know by now decent (not good or great) service in Montgomery comes with a hefty bill.

name: Ethan Hill
text: This place is such a hit or miss, if it's busy don't bother going. It's not managed well and food takes forever. Last time we went they gave us a gluten free crust and played it off as it was a regular one. Least the beer is cold. If you want mellow pizza go to the one downtown

name: Michael Ashworth
text: Haven't been here in quite some time but had an excellent lunch (pizza and salad ) . Food was great and had a really good waiter.

text: This is an amazing place to eat. As most other people on here point out though it is just horribly managed. You will be let down.

name: Holly Day

text: Food was pretty good, but the customer service was terrible & it took forever to get our food. Don't come here unless you have nothing to do the rest of the day...

name: Sharryll Muffler
text: I love Mellow Mushroom but our last experience was pretty bad. My water tasted awful, almost moldy, my sons sprite was all carbonation, no syrup, and our pizza was cold in the center. But, our waitress Brette was great. She was very nice. Sorry Mellow, might not be coming back.

name: Kelly Primus
text: Order a pickup order 45 minutes ago and leaving with no food! They took the order but didn't put it in the system. Place had less than 20 people and alot of people working...so how do you not do your job. Love Mellow Mushroom but not the 1 on Vaughn

name: Danielle Williams
text: All of the sodas taste horrible and the slices of pizza are extremely tiny. The service is horrible. I will never come here again.

name: John Shultz
text: Pricey, but damn Good

name: Angela Pearson
text: Brittany the bartender was awesome with customer service and drink making. I wanted a Moscato wine which they didn't have so she made a white wine sangria that was yummy. The pizza was also great but a bit pricey. Overall I will go back.

name: Lebanese Queen
text: The pizza sucks and it's over priced. Place was dirty and they gave us dirty plates.

name: ray carpenter
text: The beer list is from corporate and this Mellow Mushroom does not have even a third of the beers listed. If ordering a craft beer just walk up to the bar and see what they have. Pizza was great. Liked that you can smell the wood fire ovens from our side.

name: Gil Beavers

name: dcphotos
text: More employees than customers. Service is slow. Very slow. Pizza not bad, but one area of the crust was thin and burnt and another thick and chewy. I won't return to this location. ‚Ä¶More

name: heather eldridge
text: Loved the food as always. Favorite pizza place.

name: Michelle Fitting
text: The pizza was delicious. Our server was nice. But there could gave been more servers. For a crowded saturday evening, everything took to long and that was discouraging.

name: Primetime Slime
text: The pizza is the best part. The happy hour has best prices.

name: Heather Morris
text: Understaffed on a Saturday afternoon with tournament in town.  Went back at night with assurances that there would be no problem for group of 12 as full staff was in place. Two of the six parties in the group didn't get food until after others were finished eating.

name: Jonthon Parker
text: Friendly service. Typical wait you'd expect for pizza. Great pizza!

name: Kaycee Hamilton
text: I love the pizza here, but no matter how dead it is inside the service is always slow. Don't come here if you are in a rush

name: Angela Veltri
text: The entire order was wrong, and took forever to correct. The sad thing was they weren't even busy. There was one other table with maybe 8 people and that's it. The owner wasn't even the least bit helpful at all. I hadn't been there since 2016, and have no desire to return there again.

name: Dean Woods
text: Sitting in the booth right now waiting on my order and I'm literally sweating. If you can't afford to have air conditioning just close the restaurant.

name: sabuj banerjee
text: subway makes better sandwiches than these guys. overpriced and poor choices.

name: Angela B
text: Good service. We went early so it wasn't crowded.

text: Love going in here. The service is always great and management is wonderful. Food is always wonderful!!!!!

name: Althea Walker
text: The food was delicious!!

text: Service is good, food is excellent. The best part- up to 2 kids can eat free per one paying adult on Tuesdays.

name: Stephanie Shuford
text: First time there today.  Server was nice and professional, checked on us several times.  Food was hot and water was great!  I will go back!

name: Connie Lear
text: Good pizza. Bathrooms could use some housekeeping.

name: Misty Mitchell
text: Most of the food tasted good but the service was horrendous. The burgers were inedible due to the meat smelling and tasting rancid.

name: Michael Stevens

text: Food was okay. It's over priced and the service  was okay at best and there where only 2 other families in the building

name: Jim Hutson
text: If you like pizza are calzones this is the place to go eat the calzones are real good especially the steak and cheese

name: Brandon Haynes
text: The food is good but the service is terrible. I have went two times and had a bad waiter/waitress both times. I refuse to tip for service when I have to do my own waiting. So I left no tip and automatically got charged random numbers for tips both times. Why should u have to pay an extra $6 for horrible service. I will never go again.

name: Michael King
text: The beer list is down to one side of s card. The calzone, while tasty, was undercooked and doughy. This store has fallen steeply since the change of owners. Used to be my goto, now it's my last option when everyone else closes early.

name: Johnny Flowers
text: Slow service.   Parking lot over run with teenagers.

name: Eric Lewis
text: hey, its pizza. Service is sketchy and usually slow. Its close to the theater, so I go sometimes before the movie, but if you do, give them more than an hour to bring you drinks and a pizza. Sometimes their tap beer tastes 'off' so be careful ordering that. There's usually kids a plenty, so steel yourself for that.

name: Paul Powers
text: Brandon took really good care of us! It was a great experience!

name: Eric Johnson

text: The food is overpriced and does not taste better than their lower-priced competitors in the area.  The restaurant has been almost empty every time I have picked up my carryout order, so others seem to have come to the same conclusion I have: this place isn't worth your hard earned dollar.

name: Bethany M

name: Shirley Weeden
